title: Elementary Social Studies Collaborative Curriculum Development Process for Technology Integration

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in teaching social studies and basic digital tool proficiency
context.additional_context: Program for current teachers developing technology integration strategies for elementary social studies in a blended learning environment utilizing various digital devices

learning_goals: Design and develop at least one type of digital educational content for elementary social studies based on collaborative learning.

Educational team members can execute a three-stage (planning/implementation/evaluation) collaborative process among teachers, tech support teams, and librarians for technology-integrated lesson design within one week, achieving over 80% checklist completion per stage and a satisfaction survey score of 4 or higher (5-point scale).
Establish at least three strategies for utilizing digital resources to enhance information literacy.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
